Articles.Content: does anyone know how you can upload and config a terrain scatter to the game, like all the trees ect, i was just thinking if it would be possible to add like seaweed or fish to make under the water less boring?

Don't know if it can be modded. But trees on Kerbin already differ in several locations: deciduous trees in grassy areas, pine trees in higher and lower latitudes and cacti in deserts. Seaweed under water should at least be possible
sounds like a feature request for Kopernicus
